properties.title: Ocean CIRculation from ocean COLour observations (CIRCOL)
properties.description: Improve the retrieval of altimeter-derived currents in the Mediterranean Basin combining the largescale, altimeter-derived geostrophic currents with the high-resolution dynamical information contained in sequences of satellite-derived surface Chlorophyll (Chl) observations
properties.osc:consortium: CNR-INSTITUTE OF MARINE SCIENCES-ISMAR (IT),CLS COLLECTE LOCALISATION SATELLITES (FR)
